pullRequest.title: [Exam] Quiz component for exams
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de.
 Client: I documented the TypeScript code using JSDoc style.

Motivation and Context


The current implementation of the quiz exercises for the different modes includes too many features which are not needed / shouldn't be available during an exam.
Description

Extracted the base functionality of a quiz participation into a new component.
The participation is now an input of the component instead of being loaded via the url param.
The bar with the quiz-step icons is displayed on the left side and it can be navigated to the step by clicking it.
Steps for Testing

can only be tested locally until student exam participations aren't loaded into the exam view
Setup:

Import and embed the component into a component which contains a quiz participation (e.g. the quiz component). You can also comment out the other component so that only the one to test is displayed.
Pass the participation into the quiz-exam-component.

Test:

Log in to Artemis
Create a quiz with every type of quiz question
Navigate to where the component is displayed (e.g. a quiz open for practice)
Check that the quiz' components are displayed correctly and that you can interact with them
Check that you can navigate to a specific quiz question via the bottom bar

Screenshots
